com.google.android.exoplayer.chunk

Interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DemoPlayer
    Enclosing class:
    ChunkSampleSource

    public static interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of ChunkSampleSource events.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoadStarted

        void onLoadStarted(int sourceId,
                 java.lang.String formatId,
                 int trigger,
                 boolean isInitialization,
                 int mediaStartTimeMs,
                 int mediaEndTimeMs,
                 long length)
        Invoked when an upstream load is started.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        formatId - The format id.
        trigger - A trigger for the format selection, as specified by the ChunkSource.
        isInitialization - Whether the load is for format initialization data.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The media time of the start of the data being loaded, or -1 if this load is for initialization data.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The media time of the end of the data being loaded, or -1 if this load is for initialization data.
        length - The length of the data being loaded in bytes, or C.LENGTH_UNBOUNDED if the length of the data has not yet been determined.

      • onLoadCompleted

        void onLoadCompleted(int sourceId,
                   long bytesLoaded)
        Invoked when the current load operation completes.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        bytesLoaded - The number of bytes that were loaded.

      • onLoadCanceled

        void onLoadCanceled(int sourceId,
                  long bytesLoaded)
        Invoked when the current upstream load operation is canceled.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        bytesLoaded - The number of bytes that were loaded prior to the cancellation.

      • onUpstreamDiscarded

        void onUpstreamDiscarded(int sourceId,
                       int mediaStartTimeMs,
                       int mediaEndTimeMs,
                       long bytesDiscarded)
        Invoked when data is removed from the back of the buffer, typically so that it can be re-buffered using a different representation.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The media time of the start of the discarded data.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The media time of the end of the discarded data.
        bytesDiscarded - The length of the data being discarded in bytes.

      • onUpstreamError

        void onUpstreamError(int sourceId,
                   java.io.IOException e)
        Invoked when an error occurs loading media data.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        e - The cause of the failure.

      • onConsumptionError

        void onConsumptionError(int sourceId,
                      java.io.IOException e)
        Invoked when an error occurs consuming loaded data.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        e - The cause of the failure.

      • onDownstreamDiscarded

        void onDownstreamDiscarded(int sourceId,
                         int mediaStartTimeMs,
                         int mediaEndTimeMs,
                         long bytesDiscarded)
        Invoked when data is removed from the front of the buffer, typically due to a seek or because the data has been consumed.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The media time of the start of the discarded data.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The media time of the end of the discarded data.
        bytesDiscarded - The length of the data being discarded in bytes.

      • onDownstreamFormatChanged

        void onDownstreamFormatChanged(int sourceId,
                             java.lang.String formatId,
                             int trigger,
                             int mediaTimeMs)
        Invoked when the downstream format changes (i.e. when the format being supplied to the caller of SampleSource.readData(int, long, com.google.android.exoplayer.FormatHolder, com.google.android.exoplayer.SampleHolder, boolean) changes).
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        formatId - The format id.
        trigger - The trigger specified in the corresponding upstream load, as specified by the ChunkSource.
        mediaTimeMs - The media time at which the change occurred.
